name: Sanne Abeln
content: Sanne Abeln Sanne Abeln Associate Professor in Bioinformatics Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam Research My research generally involves integrating, modelling and learning from data that has been derived from several sources ranging from high-throughput molecular profiling techniques to atomic force spectroscopy measurements. My focus lies both on mining quantitative data from heterogeneous sources effectively, and modelling such data within the given physical constraints. Interests Bioinformatics Computational biophysics Data science Protein thermodynamics Mining quantitative data Publications List of publications Teaching MSc Bioinformatics & Systems Biology: Fundamentals of Bioinformatics (X_405052) Structural Bioinformatics (X_405019) Bioinformatics for Translational Medicine (X_405092) BSc minor Bioinformatics: Principles of Bioinformatics (X_401094) Research questions in Bioinformatics (X_401081) Contact s.abeln@vu.nl +31 20 59 87816 Department of Computer Science, Vrije Universiteit, De Boelelaan 1081A, 1081 HV Amsterdam, The Netherlands NU building 12th floor
